paper_abstract: An implementation of a cubic-like Chua's oscillator based on a nonlinear resistor implemented with two CMOS inverters and two linear resistors is proposed. This implementation allows one to change the shape of the characteristic function easily and this makes it easier to place the circuit in a given point of the alpha-beta diagram. A mathematical model is proposed for the simulation of the new characteristic function, and several theoretical and experimental tests are presented using commercial chip circuits. (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Simulation of a cubic-like Chua's oscillator with variable characteristic
